title: Digital Land Registry System
author: Tech Community
summary: A blockchain-based land registry system to eliminate fraudulent land transactions and provide transparent ownership records across Bangladesh.
problemStatement: Land disputes account for over 70% of civil litigation in Bangladesh. Fraudulent documents, multiple ownership claims, and lack of digitized records lead to corruption, violence, and economic losses estimated at billions of taka annually.
proposedSolution: Implement a blockchain-based digital land registry that provides immutable records of land ownership, transaction history, and automated verification. The system will integrate with existing government databases and provide public access to verified land records.
technicalArchitecture: Blockchain: Hyperledger Fabric for permissioned ledger

implementationPhases.description: Pilot in one district with digitization of existing records
Expand to 5 major districts with public portal

budgetEstimate: Initial pilot: ৳50 crore, Full implementation: ৳500 crore
expectedImpact: Save citizens billions in legal fees
